title: name change
body: I wanted to change my name and i typed it summener not summoner hadzov so i was asking for refund but u didint helped me out .So no im asking if u can to change my name to Summoner Hadzov or TheHaDzOv pls..

replies.body: Hey there, do you have a ticket number for this issue?  A specialist can look into this with you individually if you've submitted a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I'm not part of EU support but I'm happy to check it out.
ive alredy send but nothing happend why why why admins plss ... im so sad.
